snippet.title: Hector: Badge of Carnage - Episode 3: Beyond Reasonable Doom - Official Trailer (iPhone, PC)
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for Hector: Badge of Carnage - Episode 3: Beyond Reasonable Doom, the final episode of the series.

Read more here: http://www.gamespot.com/641365
